label: Daily Conversation
description: Short phrases for a calm typing session

sentences.text: Good morning, you are up early.
Did you eat breakfast already?
Do you have a busy day today?
Can I call you later?
Please wait just a moment.
What should we do for lunch?
That sounds good, I agree.
Where are you right now?
It is cold today, bring a jacket.
I will stop by the store on the way.
Have you decided on tomorrow's plan?
Do not push too hard, get some rest.
What are you doing this weekend?
It might rain, take an umbrella.
Thanks for helping me.
You should go to bed early.
Tell me about that later.
What time does the store open?
It is fine, do not worry.
Where should I put this?
